title: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Failed to recover key for codegen_fn_attrs(3b51ec5b25d9fa81-72de013b10257521) with hash 3b51ec5b25d9fa81-72de013b10257521', compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/query/mod.rs:235:5

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust n main() { let x = Some(5); match x { Some(y) if y > 2 && y < 5 => println!("first"), Some(1) => println!("second"), _ => println!("else"), } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.50.0 (cb75ad5db 2021-02-10) binary: rustc commit-hash: cb75ad5db02783e8b0222fee363c5f63f7e2cf5b commit-date: 2021-02-10 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.50.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Failed to recover key for codegen_fn_attrs(3b51ec5b25d9fa81-72de013b10257521) with hash 3b51ec5b25d9fa81-72de013b10257521', compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/query/mod.rs:235:5 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0 (cb75ad5db 2021-02-10) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack thread '' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` left: `LLVMing`, right: `Codegenning`', /rustc/cb75ad5db02783e8b0222fee363c5f63f7e2cf5b/compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/back/write.rs:1437:21 error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0 (cb75ad5db 2021-02-10) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Failed to recover key for codegen_fn_attrs(3b51ec5b25d9fa81-72de013b10257521) with hash 3b51ec5b25d9fa81-72de013b10257521', compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/query/mod.rs:235:5 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/cb75ad5db02783e8b0222fee363c5f63f7e2cf5b/library/std/src/panicking.rs:493:5 1: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt at /rustc/cb75ad5db02783e8b0222fee363c5f63f7e2cf5b/library/std/src/panicking.rs:435:5 2: rustc_middle::ty::query::try_load_from_on_disk_cache 3: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::exec_cache_promotions 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_context::{{closure}} 5: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 6: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_ignore 7: rustc_middle::ty::query::on_disk_cache::OnDiskCache::serialize 8: rustc_session::utils::::time 9: rustc_incremental::persist::save::save_in 10: rustc_session::utils::::time 11: rustc_data_structures::sync::join 12: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 13: rustc_incremental::persist::save::save_dep_graph 14: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::finalize_tcx 15: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_crate 16: ::codegen_crate 17: rustc_session::utils::::time 18: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 19: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen 20: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 21: rustc_span::with_source_map 22: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. ```
